languages.text: Трое друзей долгие циклы выживали на погибшем мире, пока подлые ксеносы не загнали несчастных в ловушку. Станет ли Вольный Торговец новым светом для обреченных?

traits.locale_text: Трое друзей долгие циклы выживали на погибшем мире, пока подлые ксеносы не загнали несчастных в ловушку. Станет ли Вольный Торговец новым светом для обреченных?

languages.text: Three friends spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?
languages.original_text: Трое друзей долгие циклы выживали на погибшем мире, пока подлые ксеносы не загнали несчастных в ловушку. Станет ли Вольный Торговец новым светом для обреченных?

traits.locale_text: Three friends had spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?
Three friends had spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?
Three friends spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?
Three friends spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?

languages.text: Trois amis ont survécu des cycles entiers sur un monde sans vie jusqu'à ce que de diaboliques xénos les conduisent dans un piège. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} deviendra-t-{mf|il|elle} la lumière de leur salut ?
languages.original_text: Three friends spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?

traits.locale_text: Trois amis ont survécu des cycles entiers sur un monde sans vie jusqu'à ce que de diaboliques xénos les conduisent dans un piège. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} deviendra-t-{mf|il|elle} la lumière de leur salut ?

languages.text: 三个伙伴在某个没有任何生机的世界中存活了好几个周期，直到邪恶的异形将他们逼进了陷阱。行商浪人会成为他们的救赎之光吗？
languages.original_text: Three friends spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?

traits.locale_text: 三个伙伴在某个没有任何生机的世界中存活了好几个周期，直到邪恶的异形将他们逼进了陷阱。行商浪人会成为他们的救赎之光吗？

languages.text: 3人の友人たちは、悪質な異種族の罠にはまるまで、生命のない惑星で数サイクルを生き永らえてきた。自由開拓者は彼らの救いの光となるのだろうか？
languages.original_text: Three friends spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?

traits.locale_text: 3人の友人たちは、悪質な異種族の罠にはまるまで、生命のない惑星で数サイクルを生き永らえてきた。自由開拓者は彼らの救いの光となるのだろうか？

languages.text: Drei Freunde haben mehrere Zyklen lang auf einer leblosen Welt überlebt, bis hinterhältige Xenos sie in eine Falle getrieben haben. Kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zum Licht ihrer Erlösung werden?
languages.original_text: Three friends spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?

traits.locale_text: Drei Freunde haben mehrere Zyklen lang auf einer leblosen Welt überlebt, bis hinterhältige Xenos sie in eine Falle getrieben haben. Kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zum Licht ihrer Erlösung werden?

languages.text: Tres amigos han pasado ciclos sobreviviendo en un mundo sin vida hasta que los viles xenos los trajeron a una trampa. ¿Será {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente la luz que les traiga la salvación?
languages.original_text: Three friends spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?

traits.locale_text: Tres amigos han pasado ciclos sobreviviendo en un mundo sin vida hasta que los viles xenos los trajeron a una trampa. ¿Será {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente la luz que les traiga la salvación?

languages.text: Üç dost, zalim zeno onları tuzağa düşürene kadar döngüler boyunca cansız dünyada hayatta kaldı. Hür Tacir, onlara kurtuluşun ışığını sunabilecek mi?
languages.original_text: Three friends spent cycles surviving on a lifeless world until villainous xenos drove them into a trap. Will the Rogue Trader become the light of their salvation?
